page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Employment. The unemployment rate in this area is well below the national average. Light industries, tourism, shops and other service industries provide employment in nearby market towns of Helmsley, Kirkbymoorside and Pickering. Farming remains an important source of employment. There has been an influx of professional people into the local villages. These people are often employed in the local schools, by the National Park, by the Forestry Commission and by banks and building societies. Some commute by car to work in York and Teeside. The range of employment for young people in limited but there is little youth unemployment. Seasonal employment provides temporary work.
